name: Cat Attack (itch) (Jaya)
description:
So look what the cat dragged in. A cat lol.

Try and survive this infinite shooter while you get surrounded by evil cats.

Collect chests to make your cat more powerful to take on the ever increasingly difficult waves of evil cats.

More Powerups, Weapons, Enemies and improvements in general are on their way!!

Update 0.0.02

> Added health bar and shield bar

> Added powerups: Bullet Pierce, Health pickup and Shield Pickup

> (Hopefully) Fixed movement

> Bullets no longer blocked by powerups
